It's a good idea to read my 'about me' before following. Only over 18s, please.

tags: don't blame children for adult's bullying
title: ...Harry wasn’t irrationally biased against Snape
body:
He just didn’t have all the information.

Harry’s negative attitude and feelings towards Snape were completely justified based on how Snape treated him and his friends. And don’t give me any of this “Snape was only shitty to Harry because Harry had a bad attitude” garbage. No, Snape was not “putting up with Harry’s bullshit”. I’m going to lose my mind. You’re talking about an adult interacting with a child. 

The very first time Harry saw Snape, Snape looked at him with enough venom that Harry knew he didn’t like him. By the end of their first lesson, he knew Snape hated him. This adult he’d never met before. How freaky would that be? 

Snape’s first words to Harry were public insults. Harry was eleven. He was a small child. Harry did nothing, absolutely nothing, to provoke Snape. Snape saw his name on a list and said the “Our new celebrity” line, humiliating him in front of Draco and his Slytherin friends. Then he asks Harry a question he knows he’s going to get wrong and mocks him when he does. And when Neville messes up his potions, Snape snaps at Harry for not stopping him and accuses him of letting Neville make a mistake so Harry would look good in comparison. And he takes a point. That’s just their first interaction. 

That kind of thing continues throughout. And yeah, eventually Harry started answering back. Good for him. Standing up for yourself against a bully is brave. It’s not “bullshit” Snape had to put up with. 

I swear to god, if I see another person claim that readers only have a negative view of Snape because the books are from Harry’s pov…

Love Snape. It’s fine and good to love him. He’s a fascinating character, he’s got wonderful good qualities as well as deeply negative qualities. He’s got qualities that make him sympathetic despite his nastines. But don’t erase his nastiness by claiming Harry’s pov wasn’t reliable. (Harry is NOT an unreliable narrator. He doesn’t lie to readers or intentionally withhold information from them. His narration is reliable based on what he experiences. If he’s wrong, it’s because he doesn’t have all the facts. Like any narrator.)

This makes me every bit as cross as “Snape was an incel who just wanted to fuck Lily”. It’s no better than that. When you say stuff like that you’re providing fodder for the people who think Snape fans are abuse apologists.

summary: Look, for a good version of the cursed child instead of some time travel nonsense have some new blood purity movement pop up a...
body:
Look, for a good version of the cursed child instead of some time travel nonsense have some new blood purity movement pop up a là the first order in the new Star Wars and call it a day. Like, it’s not the most original premise but a premise can be dumb and simple as long as it’s really well executed.


At the very least that way I wouldn’t have to think about Bellatrix and Voldemort doing the horizontal tango

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: James,what would you do if Reg became a death eater after school?
question: James,what would you do if Reg became a death eater after school?
answer: James: He wouldn’t.  If he did, then… well, he wouldn’t be the person I always thought he was.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

body:
Voldemort’s horcruxes

Okay, but if Voldemort had known anything about science he’d still be alive. Like he could have put a horcrux in the Marianna Trench, put another in a volcano. Since wizards don’t know much about theses things (like how to deal with extreme heat/pressure) and horcruxes are nearly indestructible. If he’d paid any attention to muggles he could have easily hidden a horcrux in the Moon Lander, such a big missed opportunity for him, he could have even sent a horcrux to mars.

summary:
Harry: Where have you been?
Draco: Out
Harry: Doing what?
Draco: It isn't your business!
Harry: It is when it's your turn to...
body:
Harry: Where have you been?
Draco: Out
Harry: Doing what?
Draco: It isn't your business!
Harry: It is when it's your turn to pick the children from school and you don't show up!
Draco: I went to buy this
Harry: A ring?... Oh, my god! Yes!
Draco: It was for my mother, but okay, we can marry

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: It is when it's your turn to pick the children from school and you don't show up!

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: A ring?... Oh, my god! Yes!

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: It was for my mother, but okay, we can marry

blog.name: unicornvine
blog.title: UnicornVine

summary:
Journals, by Unicornvine - Dramione, Hansy, Blinny, Thonald, Linny
 Part 3 Read the full Chapter by following the link above ^
...
caption:
Journals, by Unicornvine - Dramione, Hansy, Blinny, Thonald, Linny

Part 3

Read the full Chapter by following the link above ^

Hermione Granger Don’t… I whispered. I tried desperately to get my brain to restart itself but my focus was solely on his lips. I felt him shift, then his fingers tickled the material of my shirt until his hand pressed against my waist. I couldn’t help the shiver that ran through me. I could see him closing the gap between us, bending his head and closing his eyes and my heart leapt. Then everything seemed to crash around me.

Ginny Weasley I took a deep breath. I should actually be apologising to you… Luna, at your restaurant… she tends to speak before she thinks. He laughed. That she does. He said smiling, looking down at my lips. He is ridiculously good looking. Tall, muscular, dark skinned and his lips look plump and soft. Are you and Luna together? He asked me and I shook my head quickly. No… we’re just friends. He raised his eyebrows. Friends that… do that? He questioned. I didn’t know what to say. He wouldn’t understand.

Blaise Zabini I stood up; somewhat confidently; facing her and grabbed the hem of my t-shirt pulling it over my head. I let it fall on top of my jumper, not bothering to fold it up. What are you doing? She asked, as her eyes roamed over my chest. I didn’t even know what I was doing. I just wanted to see what she would do. She looked around the changing room as if expecting someone to walk in, then he eyes fell back on me. I’m just making things even between us. I said with a smile, my fingers finding the strings of my tracksuit bottoms and pushing them down my legs. I stepped out of them and looked at her again.

Pansy Parkinson I carried on kissing Dean. I let him put his hands on my waist and in my hair until he was pushing me back into the kitchen side. Pressing himself into me. He gripped my bottom, lifting me onto the kitchen side and I opened my legs for him, his crotch pushing into mine. His lips left mine and he flicked the hair off my neck before placing kisses and nibbles along my skin. I could have fucked him If I wanted to. I could have fucked him in the kitchen, or taken his hand and lead him to my bedroom and at that moment I was going to. I was going to do all that.
